job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: Major airline is researching an efficient way to place flights at gates in a timely manner to reduce delay penalties. In doing so, we need to be able to create data visualizations to understand the output of our predictions, assess operations research models, and work with the team to implement changes. Must have Scripting: Python, Spark, Unix, SQL  Data Platforms: Teradata, Cassandra, MongoDB, Oracle, SQL Server, ADLS, Snowflake, Azure Data Explorer. Administration skills a plus  Azure Cloud Technologies: Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure Blob Storage, Azure Data Lake, Azure Power Apps and Azure Functions  CI/CD: GitHub, Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Terraform  BI Analytics Tool Stack - Cognos, Tableau, Power BI, Alteryx, Denodo, and Grafana  Data Warehousing: DataStage, Informatica  Data Governance and Privacy: Informatica Axon and EDC, BigID 5+ years software solution development using agile, dev ops, product model that includes designing, developing, and implementing large-scale applications or data engineering solutions.  5+ years data analytics experience using SQL  3+ years full-stack development experience, preferably in Azure  3+ years of cloud development and data lake experience (prefer Microsoft Azure) including Azure EventHub, Azure Data Factory, Azure Functions, ADX, ASA, Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, Azure Blob Storage, Azure Data Lake, Azure Power Apps and Power BI.  Airline Industry Experience  Nice to have  Python, Spark, Unix, SQL English: C2 Proficient
